import React, { useState } from 'react' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: '', email: '', firstname: '', lastname: '', password: '', re_password:'' }) const { username, email, firstname, lastname, password, re_password } = user; const onChange = e => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("called"); } return (
